channel.title: Arquillian attacks Android!
channel.description: blog of Stefan Miklosovic - GSoC 2013 participant

item.title: The final blog release
item.description: The last blog regarding of GSoC 2013 is out! I will evaluate the whole project and add some insights for the future. Lets check it!

item.title: Moving forward
item.description: In the fourth blog regarding Arquillian Droidium, I will summarize the overall situation, results of the previous blog post will be discussed and plans into the future will be given.

item.title: Ike has new battle front
item.description: The third blog post regarding of Arquillian Android container has a lot of new stuff to mention. The last two weeks were very vivid and dynamic in terms of the overall project direction and cooperation options. You are welcome to check it all …

item.title: Plans, plans, plans ...
item.description: In the second blog post, I would like to sum up what I have been doing lately regarding Arquillian container and what are issues to look at in upcomming two weeks (or so).

item.title: Ike starts the battle!
item.description:
My name is Stefan Miklosovic and I am participant of GSoC 2013. This blog is dedicated to tracking of development progress for GSoC.

Source code of this blog can be found here.

This GSoC will be focused on closer and better integration of Arquillian with Android. There is already a lot of work done. Read more about Arquillian Android intergration in the blog post!

This whole site is RSS ready. Just past this site (miklosovic.net) into your RSS reader and you are done.
